dataset.name: Mean expenditure per MSOA 2019-2024
dataset.description: the mean expenditure released from customer current accounts, aggregated to MSOA (or intermediate zone for Scotland) level, for the years 2019 to 2024

year.description: year to which the means are aggregated

msoa11cd.description: MSOA (or intermediate zone for Scotland) code

mean_expenditure.description: mean total expenditure released from the customer current accounts of an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_committed_mortgage.description: mean expenditure categorised as regularly committed mortgage payment, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_committed_rent.description: mean expenditure categorised as regularly committed rent payment, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_committed_other.description: mean expenditure categorised as regularly committed payments that are uncategorised, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_essential_council_tax.description: mean expenditure categorised as essential council tax payments, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_essential_other.description: mean expenditure categorised as essential council that are uncategorised, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_qol.description: mean expenditure categorised as quality of life spend, this could be purchases for clothes or furnishing of a better standard, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_discretionary_pension.description: mean expenditure categorised as payment to an opted-in-for pension scheme, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_discretionary_other.description: mean expenditure categorised as non-essential expenditure that is uncategorised, released from an MSOA for the segmented year

mean_expenditure_uncategorized.description: mean expenditure categorised as uncategorised expenditure, this could be essential or non-essential - it is unknown, released from an MSOA for the segmented year
